6.「やはり……。修行を進めていたのは| ヤーン様ではなく あなたでしたか。: As I thought... it was you, not Mr. Yarn, who|was promoting the training.

8.「きっと あなたは 何も知らされずに| その修行を やっているのでしょうね。: Steel Lance, I am sure you are doing this|practice without any knowledge of what you are|doing.

9.「超天道士の名を継ぐための修行を| 他人にやらせるとは……。| まったく ヤーン: I can't believe they let someone else do the|training to carry on the name of Choten|Doshi... What was Master Yarn thinking?

10.「私も超天道士にあこがれ 弟子入りを望んだ者。| 代われるものなら 代わりたいと: I, too, longed to be a supernaturalist and|wished to become an apprentice. If I could|replace him, I would.

11.「いや 失礼しました……。| それでは また お会いしましょう。: No, excuse me... we will see each other again.

15.「あちゃ～。バレちまったのか～。: Oh no! I've been found out~.

17.「だというのに 超天道士様の死後| あなたは 遊んでばかり……。: And yet, ever since the death of the Cho-|Tendo-sama, all you do is play...

18.「そのあなたが ようやく| 超天道士様の名を継ぐ覚悟を決めたのかと| 私は よろ: I was delighted to see that you had finally|made up your mind to take over the name of|Choutenshi-sama.

19.「何度も 言ってきたはずだ。| オレは超天道士の名になんか 興味ない。| だから: I have told you many times. I'm not interested|in the name of Choutei. That's why I wanted|him to take over.

20.「悪いな～ <pc>。| だますつもりじゃ なかったんだ。: I'm sorry <pc>. I didn't mean to|trick you.

22.「それは まちがいです。| あなたは <pc>殿を 大変なことに| 巻き込んでし: You are mistaken. You have gotten|<pc> into a lot of trouble.

24.「このままでは 死にます。: If this continues, I will die.

27.「だが 修行を進めているのは コイツだぜ～。| ということは 死ぬのは コイツだ: But he's the one who's training to be the|best. Which means he's the one who's going to|die, right?

28.「そうです。<pc>殿は| 超天遊戯の書の修行を 後戻りの| できないところまで: Yes, it is true. <pc> has advanced|his practice of the Book of Choten Yugi to the|point of no return...

After completing the training up to the Book|of San, is already in a state in|which he has acquired much of the power of the|
|Chotenji-sama.

If a person in that state fails to complete|his final training and does not carry on the|name of Chotendoji, his body cannot withstand|
|the outburst of his inner po[...]

31.「行きつく先は……死あるのみ。| <pc>殿が その運命から| 逃れることは で: The only end... is death. There is no way for|<pc> to escape that fate.

32.「……わかった。オレが なんとかする。| 死の書をよこせ ガウラド。: I'll take care of it. I'll take care of it.|Give me the Book of Death, Gaurad.

33.「私は持っていません。死の書が どこにあるかは| ご自身で探されると よいでしょ: I don't have it. You will have to find the|Book of Death yourself.

34.「超天道士様の弟子である ヤーン様ならば| 見つけるのは たやすいことかと。: As a disciple of Heavenly Warrior Yarn, he|should be easy to find.

35.「では 私は これで。: Well then, I'll take my leave.

36.「今の話を 信じられないって顔してるな～。: You look like you can't believe what you just|heard!

38.「ヤベ～。昔の記憶が よみがえってきやがる。| オレも いろいろ ひで～目にあっ: Oh no! It's bringing back old memories. I've|been through a lot of terrible things myself.

39.「……まあ～ それは 置いといてだ。| とにかく アンタには 修行を| 続けても: Well~ let's put that aside. Anyway, it looks|like you'll have to continue your training.

42.「オレは 死の書を探してみる。| 心当たりも あるっちゃ～ あるんだ。: I'm going to look for the Book of Death. I|have an idea of what I'm looking for.
